name: Agent Audit Workflow
description: Runs lightweight read-only prompts to check agent configuration health and summarize outstanding TODOs.

steps.prompt: In 150 words or less, summarize the current autonomous-agent setup (MCP servers, migrations, orchestrators) using quick repository inspection. Focus on whether any required MCP configs or migrations are missing.
List the top three TODO or FIXME items related to autonomous agents found in the repository. Return a short bullet list with file references.
